pages.text: The $(d)Block Mover$() allows you to pick up and move blocks around easily. This $(3)includes blocks with block entities$(), like Chests!$(br2)Right-click a block to pick it up, then right-click again to place it down.
pages.title: Block Mover

pages.text: Blocks with the block tag $(c)#irregular_implements:block_mover_blacklist$() cannot be moved with the Block Mover.$(br2)By default, this includes blocks like Bedrock.
